page.title: 10Old People in Banbury
page.content: We went to see Vicky Mayo's mum. She is a warden at Amos Court. A lot of old people live there. There are 59 flats for old people only. In each flat there are three alarms - one in the bathroom, one in the living room and one in the bedroom. Also in the bathroom there is a pole to help you get out of the bath. The warden took us to look at a flat owned by Mrs Henderson. She was a very nice lady. She took us round the house showing us her rooms. She had a settee that turns into a bed. Her room was very nice, full of pictures and bright flowers. A lot of old people live in their own homes. Some live with their children's families, but there are a lot of sheltered homes and old people's homes now because there are a lot more old people living longer nowadays.
